name: ConditionsAssociatedWithHeadAndNeckRadiotherapy
title: Conditions Associated with Head and Neck Radiotherapy
description: System kicked out V489. and V488. as invalid codes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set encodes a Action defining the concept head and neck radiotherapy for the AAO-HNSF guideline on Cerumen Impaction),(Data Element Scope: This valueset is intended to work with the data element type, Condition/Diagnosis/Problem),(Inclusion Criteria: Search terms included: head neck face),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
